titleStmt.title: Some observations upon the keeping the thirtieth of January, and twenty ninth of May by J.G.G.
titleStmt.author: Gailhard, J. (Jean)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Ric. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Jan. 30 was the day to mourn the murder of Charles I; May 29 was the day to celebrate birth of Charles II.
